ygData.subject: Re: Re: Another question...somebody STOP me
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Honestly I haven t had a problem with that in quite a while... I do try to avoid the idiot-heavy zones though. Closest thing i ve had happen was when i d
ygData.messageBody:
>True. What I hate is when people dont' realize I'm
>kiting something and decide to "help" me by killing
>the things chasing me. Happens all the time.

Honestly I haven't had a problem with that in quite a
while... I do try to avoid the idiot-heavy zones
though. Closest thing i've had happen was when i'd
just started Root 'n Rotting a MOB, stacked the snare,
root and DOT, then a melee came along and started
whacking it...

>Well, the bear skins are ok if you aren't
>roleplaying and decide it's ok for a druid to be
>killing bears. I personally don't kill bears or
>wolves with my druid.

If I want to roleplay, I show up at the local Vampire:
The Masquerade LARP. ;) If I want to run around and
whack things for experience, I play EQ. :) I long ago
gave up on even remotely considering EQ a RPG...

>However, if you can make it through Paludal Caverns
>and get to Shadeweaver's Thicket in one piece, there
>are tons of rockhopper hides.

Yeah, found out about that a few days after Luclin
came out, still haven't gone up there to try it out...
Got a strong aversion to Luclin mostly due to how
poorly it ran when I went up there the first few
times. ;) (also I tend to be a creature of habit,
sticking to zones I know :)
